alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:57AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cherry County through 645 AM CDT/545 AM MDT/... At 557 AM CDT/457 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Kilgore, or 12 miles west of Valentine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valentine, Crookston, Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River, Sparks, Smith Falls State Park and Schlagel Creek State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 177 and 210. Highway 97 between mile markers 129 and 141. Highway 83 between mile markers 196 and 222. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
